string.text: I know one small anomaly, it can also absorb, but nobody likes it, I think you're wrong, there are no anomalies.

You're wrong, young man. Look at this fire. See the flickering? The fact is that it is at this point, right under our noses we see a phenomenon that does not threaten man! On the contrary, it is very responsive to our actions. We called him "White Flame". Do you feel warm? Here, it is impossible to light a fire on this place! No matter how hard we tried, we poured different combustible mixtures and even tried to set fire to it with a flamethrower. But everything just goes out when the fire gets into the field. But in contrast, it warms up if it is nearby, but does not burn, no matter how close you bring your hand, the sensors detect a steady temperature. But that's not all...
Oh, how... What else is wrong with it?

He can cook food on it! Frying, cooking, even stewing, I try to understand how it regulates the temperature of the dishes in which the food is cooked, Spirit, our chef, says that he just talks to him, says: "Fry! And it warms up the frying pan, I saw for myself how he asked me to turn down the fire and the temperature dropped! Young man... Do you have any idea what this means for a man? If only we could understand how it works, gas, coal, even nuclear power plants... Everything would have changed! The future is coming to an end right under our noses! And we can have our hands on it!
Unbelievable...
And you can help me... Not for free of course. Interested?
Of course.
What the hell... And what if... Sorry... Have we already started talking to you? I'm sorry, I...
No, no, it's not that simple.
And what if...
Yeah, it's like...
It's warm... Soothing.
That's terrible how... Scary to live.
Are you all right?
Yeah, yeah. It's okay, I was swallowed up by this little anomaly. This is very interesting!
No you!
So... So X is multiplied by sinus... And we divide 180 by X, when we have X... Um, yes?
Hell, there's no way she can be here. It's not exactly from here, but how...?
If the calculations are correct... And they are loyal to Kovalev... True, yes, it seems impossible... À? What is it?
So, the radius is 3 meters, the diameter... 6.
Yes... It should be written down, all this should be written down. Every comma is important. Every digit, I almost understood...
No, no, no, no... Can't it be that simple, or can it?
I'm here about the job.
How are the searches going?
I'm still doing the job.
I couldn't find the samples you needed.
That's too bad. This is a serious setback that will have a major impact on our research.
I'm here to help you with your research.
I hope you're not pretending to be my candidate.
I'm only interested in money so far.
There's a lot of interesting anomalies that armed groups bypass here in military warehouses. I need samples from them.
I collected artifacts.
Excellent.
How do you know where the artifacts you need are?

Our research team is part of the Scientific Research Institute of ChAZ. We are studying the area to find a way to destroy it or at least control it. We have learned a lot from the information received from the Gunslinger, including a map of the location of anomalies.
So this is who marked the anomalies on the map.
The Red Forest has several anomalies of interest to us, the exact coordinates of the Gunners dropped along with the PDA in the tunnels. Find first the PDA and then the artifacts we are interested in.
I found the anomalies listed in PDA.
Here is your reward.
Are there any more artifacts you need?

Work on the creation of artificial artifacts was carried out even before the disaster. My supervisor used to live and work in Limansk. We stayed at his house for a long time, discussing scientific work. And if memory serves me right, then I saw something resembling an artifact even then.
What happened to your friend?
I don't know, the evacuation from Limansk never happened. It is not known where its inhabitants went. But I remember the address of his house. Maybe we should check if the artifact is still there.
Limansk is in a terrible state. There are no residents there, but I managed to find the artifact.
It can't be.
What have we come to?
Curious sample. Undeniable proof that artifacts can be obtained artificially.
How is it possible that artifacts could have appeared before the zone appeared?

Have you heard anything about artifact farms? Research has been going on in this direction for a long time. Doing this lab X-19, now destroyed. And "beds" for her served as a dead forest. The territory is dangerous. But we need any information. I think we should look for the rest of the technical documentation at the entrance to the laboratory. Maybe there are artifacts left on the bed. It is also worth checking.
Just like you said. Documentation and artifact.
Oh, that's great. Don't ask me how I knew it would all be there. Here is your reward. I hope for your silence.
Anything else?
A large group of mercenaries controls the Dead City area. Anomalous activity there is relatively weak, but we need artifacts from there.
Nice town and residents are hospitable.
I'm glad you liked it.
I'm ready to go.
I'll note the anomalies I'm interested in. Can you get the artifacts out of there?
I've completed your mission.
Here's the reward, just like I promised.
What else is there?

New data is coming in. We don't all know about the zone. A lot of anomalies are still not on the map. I will note the approximate coordinates of their dislocations. But be careful, I'm sure they are not in the general database for a reason.
Here are the samples.
Okay, great.
As there any more tasks?
I want to send you to the most dangerous part of the area right now, Pripyat. I noted the anomalies I am interested in on the map.
Task accomplished.
I hope it was worth it.
Show the detector, I need to make sure.
That you deserve.
No, it's a murky job.
But...
It is. I have "Bear"
It is. I have "Elite"
It is. I have "Svarog"
Oh, I have a great "response"!
Here, I have a great Bear!
Eh... Man, you've been punched... It's not a detector.
What?
It is. I have a "Response"
Detector got it?
Well, as you know. My business is to suggest...
....and mine to refuse.
Fourty on the tail has brought news. Are we going to sharpen the lanyards or are you going to do the job?
Reward.
I don't have it.
Are you a junkie? Get out of here, don't interfere with the work.
Yeah, that'll do. Okay, look, here you go, here you go, and... Here is another one.
Roger that, I'm on my way.
And how can you be so sure there'll be something there?
The Tarot's maps were wrong. Are you taking it or not?
Not so fast, what do I get for the job?
So that's what I found in there, what is it, anyway? Some strange artifacts.
Hmm... Yes, this is what it should be. The devices were not wrong, yes... Yes!
Nothing complicated, you can handle it.

You have no idea what's going on around here because of your ignorance! We are on the threshold of unimaginable discoveries! Of course, there are mistakes, but what you have brought is solid evidence! Damn it! Then it turns out... Yes, yes! We need to clarify something else! In the meantime... So, your reward... What currency are you in? Or I can give you a container with two sections for artifacts.
Hryvnias.
Rubles.
Dollars.
Container.
Here you go. So... Now I need to...
You're a pleasure to deal with, you know.
Wow, don't jump out of the combo, is that so important?
Wait, Stalker! You're looking at this kind of work, do you want to earn more?
Yes, what do you want this time?
No, I've had enough of this.
Stop stalker! Don't be in a hurry to refuse! ...Okay! I will pay twice as much as I did last year. Well? Okay?
Double the amount? Okay, I'm interested in you.
No, I'm done. Find another suicide bomber.
Damn it! Whatever you want.

Obviously, I'm not the only one doing research here. At the Research Institute of Agricultural Industry, my colleague Dubrov is doing similar research. The fact is that he hasn't been in touch for nineteen hours. I suppose the worst is that he is dead. But it's too unusual if they were attacked, even if they were mutants, or idiots looking for easy profit in the face of scientists, then his group, if they hadn't coped with it, would have contacted the military, they were very close there, and the bearing would have been disturbing, and here, the silence, as through the ground fell. Your task will be to get to the last coordinates from where he was contacted, find any leads, and even dead bodies. If you find dead bodies... Dubrov should have a laptop with all the notes about the work done, see if he has completed the task "3.7" If not, then do it. This is an examination of certain anomalies for inactive artifacts, you've already done it, whatever you find, bring it to me. But I hope it's any other byte, but don't... Enough dead bodies for us. So, already... That's it, that's it! Is the task clear? Look, it's very important, I need to know what happened to them, but I can't quit everything and go and find out what's going on, especially when you've proved that I'm very close to a solution.
Well?
Kovalev, I don't want to die. Even in the name of "fundamental" discoveries.
But... Damn it! At least you know where to find me and what to do. I hope you'll listen to the voice of reason.
Behave.
Okay.
What about Amber? He is very close. Contact them, let them do some reconnaissance.
On "Amber-3" and without me there is enough trouble, we already have work on each employee for three.
What do I owe for that?
No offense. Don't worry.
No, I won't take it.

But why? After all, I have explained to you the importance of this! You are not the one who is chasing the flesh! We are on the verge of fundamental discoveries, a little more and we can... The applications of our research are limitless!
Yeah, fuck me...
I'm a Kovalev...

Well? Are they alive? Is he alive? Did this jerk fuck up his laptop? Is the radio broken? Did all three have a broken walkie-talkie? Are they okay? After all, he always makes copies, the information must be at least partially saved! After all, he always said to me, "Make copies! You never know what will happen!"
Yeah, I remember a double award. In any case, you deserve it. So in what currency?
Hryvnias.
Rublish.
Dollars.
So what? Where are you going now? It's convenient to do business with you. Will you do something else?
First, you answer me a few questions. And I'll think about whether I need it.
Come on. I will try to answer.
What kind of research are you doing here?

I am part of the Jupiter 6 scientists now based in the Amber 3 bunker, but this is temporary, after the Baffle Station has been turned on and the path to Jupiter is cut off, the entire Jupiter 6 bunker is considered missing and presumably dead, but I don't believe it all. Our research is focused on... How can I put this? Here. We study spatial holes, pocket measurements, parallel worlds, alternative realities...
Why do you think Jupiter 6 is working?
Calm down, I don't know where they are.
Stop listing, I get it. È? Have you achieved any results?

Yes, of course. Look around you, there's a tutu house. It shouldn't be here, and what else is characteristic... It is completely empty. According to satellite photos, and to the questions of my father, who conducted the service here, there was no house before the evacuation. There is an old man at the pumping station, by the way, who is called Mikhalych, who claims that this house did not appear more than a couple of months ago. The patrols of the Clear Sky group confirm his words. There is a passageway here somewhere.
Passage?

Yes, and it's the biggest in the area, others, you've studied them, much less, there you've found these "artifacts". If I find him... Who knows how things will turn out. Where do these holes lead to? Many have disappeared, we hear their scraps of requests for help, their cries of despair, who cries, who shoots themselves starving or thirsty, one thing's for sure, they can't find a way out of this anomaly, it's almost impossible to get out of it, but there have been isolated cases, people have gotten out of these units, nobody in their right mind, what they're telling us is delusional. Their testimony differs diametrically. One of them had a fog around him, he was shaving through the sandy desert, occasionally encountering a rusty skeleton of the same car that we never understood about the car, but interestingly, every time we came across it, in a rusty place, but with the trunk closed, he'd find the same old jar of canned food, and Dr. Pepper's tin can, as we understand it, had been shaving in the desert for months, sometimes meeting that car again and every time it was like he hadn't met it. I think if it weren't for his bang, he'd have died of thirst or hunger. His name was... God willing, God willing... Yarovenko Alexey. Exactly. Stalker is a loner. He ran away from the bloodsucker on the agro-industrial site and doesn't remember how he ended up in the desert.
What are these artifacts? Why are they "inactive"?
And how did he get out?

Says that he was taken under control by an entity similar to a humanoid shadow, and had no choice but to move his frozen legs behind it, so he was met by a mercenary patrol in Limanskoye. He stood and looked into the wall, but only poked him with a gun, like a house of cards. Now it's on the big ground, in the lab.
Don't you think Dubrov found a way in? I wonder how he will get out of it now.
Because "Jupiter 6" was packed as a bunker of long maintenance, there will be enough supplies for years of crawling life.

You see, they're deactivated away from their birth zone. The first artifacts we took out of the zone, but in laboratories they seemed to be preserved, and when they came back they blossomed. These artifacts you found were not from here. They weren't born here. Somehow they came into our dimension, and they were naturally preserved. We're trying to make a map of the holes in space using them, and what we see isn't good news.
That's it?
That's it?

With every year, the holes are getting bigger and bigger. Artifacts are not the only thing that comes to us from outside. Did you pay attention to the population of mutants? On their kinds? Such mutations in our conditions are impossible. Anyway not all. Here to take at least... Controller.
Yeah, I thought about it, I hope we're both wrong.
That's it.
So what? Have you made a decision? We have a decent payment, and it's a right thing to do. Agree.
Okay. I agree.
No, I'm done for now.
You know where to find me when you change your mind.
Think about it? Have you changed your mind?
Yes.

I came to the place you pointed out, searched everything around, but neither the bodies nor the Dubrov group itself were there, but I found his laptop. Task 3.7 wasn't finished, I bypassed all the remaining coordinates and collected samples.
No.
Are you saying that the controllers came from another world?
It's just a theory so far. Nothing more.
That's what happens? Have I investigated the locations of potential spatial holes? And could I get into one of them?
Yeah, you did, did you? No, they are too small. Here, for example, in the vicinity of the church, the passage is quite large. So big that the whole house has passed through...
Fuck that... I'm out of here.
Wait! Everything is in the buckle. From here we won't get anywhere.
Where's that confidence coming from?
Yes... You will not understand. Take it for granted.
Damn it... Damn... Give it all here, you've done your best. Well, if you haven't found the bodies, maybe they're still alive. Or maybe... Well, it's not your headache anymore. In what currency?
Hryvna.
Rubles.
Dollars.
You remember what we agreed on?
What do we do next, Kovalev?

I'm sending you to my colleague, he wrote that he needs help, with all the rest of the work here, I can do it myself, you will only interfere. Okay, here's a mark for you, maybe we'll see each other again.
I still need to perform a lot of calculations here. And you go to the north of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. Skabinsky is already there. He has always been a suicidal person...

Our calculations are full of holes due to lack of information, but we have managed to find out where the anomaly that is out of the calculation is. Now it is being examined by our head Academician Skabinsky. He wanted to tell you something, I think you should hurry up, the place is dangerous. He shouldn't have gone there alone.
I'm listening.
Why don't you ask your colleagues from Amber?
I work separately from the scientific group on Amber. These idlers haven't investigated the nearest anomalies so far. Find these artifacts and I will pay you well.
With your samples.
Perfect work, young man.
As there any more tasks?
In the neighboring area, which is called the Wild, strange fluctuations were found. It seems that there are formations of interest to us that are worth exploring.
I found them.
Wonderful.
Give me something more dangerous.

I didn't want to give you this assignment, but I can't wait. The research plan has to be done. There used to be a secret laboratory on the territory of Amber. Psi radiation here is incredibly high, which could not but affect the peculiarities of the local samples. It is necessary to prepare properly for this sortie.
It wasn't easy, but I got it all together.
Great, that's enough for me for a while.
Hello.
Hello, Stalker, what are you doing here?
Then I have nothing to talk to you about, free.
Wait, but maybe...
Great, then let's get started.
You don't care? I have things to do here.
None of your business.
Hmm... Business as usual. Do you want to earn money? Don't break, I know you're always broke.
Let's say so, but at least explain the point.
Very good. So, not far from here there are several anomalous zones, your task will be to get artifacts from there, I hope you have at least a detector?
Yes, there is.
No more.
Problems?
Yes, this area is full of mutants and bandits, and these idiots sent me here alone. How do they imagine I can do my job.
What's the task?
There are some pretty hard anomalies here. Practically not found here. You need to get samples from them.
It wasn't easy.
But you did it.
Anything else?
Technical cemetery is a poorly researched territory, many people avoid it, although there are a number of curious anomalies. Find the artifacts there and bring them to me, I'll pay well for them.
Easy walk can't be called an easy walk.
Thanks.
What's next?
As you see, without help, I'm like a handless man. I sent one stalker to the landfill to place prototypes in anomalies. But he disappeared somewhere.
In these places it's not surprising.
My assistant placed two experimental specimens in the anomalies and then disappeared. Find his PDA, there must be the anomalies we need and then take the test samples.
Your messenger was killed by bandits, but I was able to find your samples.
And that's good.
What's new?

In the zone there is a new group of researchers, collecting artifacts throughout the zone. Well, as artifacts, garbage of all kinds, none of the stalkers would not even have taken on this, but they are looking for. Interested?
How do I find them?
Not interested.
They're scattered all over the area. One, they say, was seen recently in the marshes. He was taking some measurements in a church.
How's it going?
God, you found me. Are you ready to get into gigantic anomaly? Go deep into it, get into its dangerous center?
Could be.
Please not.
It's extremely difficult to get there. Take this advanced detector, it shows the location of anomalies. So you will have a better chance of succeeding.
Thanks.
You hear that? The zone calls us. Move out. Go and take her gift. I'll be waiting for you here.
I found an artifact on the generators.
Thank you, stalker. Science is in an invaluable debt to you. You deserve a worthy award. Let's get the artifact here soon.
Of course, take it, bro.
E, no. I'll need this artifact myself.
You're forgetting, we had a deal. We will not tolerate its violation!
Okay, okay, here's your artifact.
With this artifact, I'm almost invulnerable. There is nothing you can do to me!
Well, hold on, nits.

Thank you. Although our paths diverge here, we will always remember you. No money can appreciate your contribution to science, but this modest amount, I think, will not be superfluous. I advise you to immediately sit down for your thesis, your experience in studying anomalies is invaluable. Hopefully our paths will cross again, I will recommend you for admission to our institute. Thank you again. Have a good day with stalker.
At last we met, how's the search going?

Well, hello. Is that you, the stalker who helped our group with its research? Looks like we shouldn't have hoped for your help, the calculations are wrong, this damn place is not the center of the zone. Everything was in vain.
Can't you do anything else?
All you could do is you already did. Now get out. The failure of our operation is your fault.
Okay.
I see.
Ambitious plans.
Happy for you.
This never ends.
With us?
In the Zone, you always have to think first and then do it.
Well, I know that.
Very interesting.
For a decent reward, of course.
Artifacts don't spread on bread.
What am I doing? I'm already upside down.
I'm trying not to shine a light on the hubarom.
Main, so it doesn't fall again.
I hope you haven't thought of throwing anomalies yet.
It's the coordinates of the anomalies. Examine them with the detector. There should be samples of interest to me.
We don't buy artifacts from stalkers or bandits. Without knowledge of the exact place of origin, they are useless to us. Our task is to collect samples from every corner of the zone.

Each artifact, even one kind of artifact - has a unique radiation depending on where it was found. On each of them, the zone has left a unique imprint that is not to be confused with anything else. Knowing the full spectrum of radiation, we can make a psionic map of the zone. Understand the origins of those disturbances that caused the zone. Or maybe we can control them.

Thanks to you, our computing cluster is busy with calculations around the clock. Information for analysis for years to come. Still, it was the right decision, despite the risks, will be divided by the team throughout the territory. Here our head academician Skabinsky acted far-sightedly. It is impossible for one person to comprehend such a large structure in its entirety. It was only by combining our thinking skills that we could succeed.

Thank you for being with us. Usually the stalkers that help us constantly disappear. Preliminary analysis of the spectrogram is full of surprises, it seems that the center of the zone has been under our nose all this time. Our colleague did not wait for the final calculations and has already moved there. But I am still inclined to finish drawing up the map. I'll get a few more samples.

Our case is coming to an end. Soon we will prove that we are worthy to take our place... You know that in the center of the zone there is a gigantic anomaly, and all the psy-lines intersect there? The artifact, which will be born in this unique place, will have unique properties. The zone will finally talk to us.

Spot news. Our colleague has stopped contacting us. There is no reason to hope for the best, most likely he died. In the middle of the zone is a giga anomaly. It is almost impossible to pass it. We will think about how to solve this problem, maybe it is worth to clarify the calculations.

As you may have already guessed, I'm working in the research group of the Institute for the Study of the Chernobyl Anomalous Zone. Artefacts are invisible to the human eye, but the frequency they emit can be registered by detectors.

Each artifact emits energy at its own frequency. It's like a fingerprint, the author's signature on a work of art. The wider the scanning range of the detector, the more artifacts it can find. As a rule, stalkers are looking for artifacts with outstanding properties. Meanwhile, any anomaly specimens are of interest to science.

As you know, the Arrower managed to figure out the secret of the Zone. This information is now available to many scientists. This has greatly advanced us in our understanding of the amazing nature of anomalies, how they affect the world around us and living organisms. Now we collect base of practical observations and measurements on district. This work is not easy to call simple. That's why we are looking for helpers from free stalkers.

The rupture of the noosphere, which everyone knows as the second explosion, was the reason for the creation of an abnormal zone. The power lines of the psi-fields, like a tentacle, envelop this area. Every object that is in the zone falls under their influence. Even you are already marked by the zone. What about the artifacts that are born in its womb. This is an amazing gift that not everyone can appreciate. And it's not about the money they're worth. Artifacts are messengers of the zone, through them she communicates with us. That's why we need them so much.

Each artifact has a unique modulation, even if they are of the same type. It can tell us a lot about such a mysterious thing as noosphere. The stupidest thing you can do is cling them to your belts and hope that it will save you from bullets or anomalies. Now we're just getting to the bottom of it, and there are plans to make a full spectrogram of the zone, which will require a lot of territory to get around.

Have you ever wondered what the artifacts are made of? Most often they are the remains of living beings caught in the anomaly. So the next time you decide to boast of a rare find, remember, it could be the remains of the same stalker. Well, or boar, who knows.

Anomalies are believed to be some kind of space-time ruptures where the physical laws of our world stop working. But there is another viewpoint that this is a powerful source of signal that we simply cannot accept. Who is transmitting them and why? Or maybe it's just the lid of a pot that rattles because of the boiling broth?

Anomaly most often chooses organic samples as the receiver of information. For example, wild animals or zombies that often die in them. This is how artifacts appear. Knowing the exact origin of an artifact, you can read it as a book or as a flash drive.
There's anything?
Find an artifact
I'll find it
Don't
Okay
What's with the assignment?

Zaton is poorly researched. Calculations show that these places should contain the artifacts we are interested in. In order to pinpoint the anomalies to be investigated, I have restored the equipment at the "Circle" sounding station. It took time to scan, and it was dangerous to stay, so I'm here. To start our research, we had to get to the station and take the memory module. All the necessary data is there. By the way, there are some anomalies there, maybe they contain the right samples, but it will only be possible to say exactly after receiving the scanned data.
Easy walk. Recovered data, found artifacts.
Wonderful.
Other task?
The following anomalies are well known but very dangerous. Be careful on the bridge.
Check.
That's it.
